Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Extends authorization of the county of Steuben to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2023
Summary: Extends from November 30, 2020 to November 30, 2023, the authorization granted to the county of Steuben to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Steuben to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
